Well I don't know much about anything, but I sure liked this film. In short, it was creative, humorous, simple, and heartwarming. I could tell that the people working on this film loved each other and loved what they were doing and that never fails to translate beautifully to audiences.
The animation was crisp and fluid, but cut too short for my personal taste. I would have liked to see more of some things that were orchestrated with love and finesse
